snippet: The world’s top supplier of PCs says the latest quarterly figure reflects the shift as people switch to going online wirelessly.
abstract: Lenovo Group reports quarterly profit of $220 million, or $2.12 a share, up 36 percent from period year earlier; gain is attributed to sales of smartphones and tablet computers, which more than doubled; revenue rose 13 percent from year earlier to $9.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: The world’s top supplier of PCs says the latest quarterly figure reflects the shift as people switch to going online wirelessly.

headline.main: Lenovo Reports a 36% Jump in Profit
headline.print_headline: Lenovo Reports a 36% Jump in Profit
